question: A moving coil galvanometer is converted into an ammeter of range 0 to 5 mA. The galvanometer resistance is <katex>$90\Omega$</katex> and the shunt resistance has a value of <katex>$10\Omega$</katex>. If there are 50 divisions in the galvanometer-turned-ammeter on either sides of zero, its current sensitivity is
